```{r}
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(zipcodeR)
```


```{r Testing code}
IVRS_data <- read.csv(file.choose(), header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE, check.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
zcodes <- IVRS_data$`Client Zip Code` %>%
  na.omit(zcodes)

for (i in 1:length(zcodes)) {
  IVRS_data$AAA_newzip <- reverse_zipcode(zcodes[i])$state
}

```
